cis175.clockproject

Class TimesConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • cis175.clockproject.TimesConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Time_Constants

    public class TimesConverter
extends java.lang.Object
implements Time_Constants
    Converts a long value of seconds to its composite weeks, days, hours, minutes, and (remaining) seconds values.
    Version:
    1.0 CIS175 Spring 2019
    Author:
    Daniel Williams, Matthew Ambrose

      • updateTimeComponents

        public void updateTimeComponents(long _secs)
        Takes a given number of seconds and converts it into its component time units. Instance variables for weeks, days, hours, minutes, and (remaining) seconds can them be accessed by Getters.
        Parameters:
        _secs - long - number of seconds to be converted into its component time units.
